str2: From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Wisdom, insight, skill (human or divine), intelligence. From sophos; wisdom.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Probably from the base of ginosko; the intellect, i.e. Mind; by implication, meaning.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, compute, calculate. From psephos; to use pebbles in enumeration, i.e. to compute.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A number, total. From airo; a number.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly: a wild beast, hence: any animal; met: a brute. Diminutive from the same as thera; a dangerous animal.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A number, total. From airo; a number.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A number, total. From airo; a number.
Six hundred. Plural ordinal from hex and hekaton; six hundred.
